content:
Scheduling the follow-up call for the same time slot as the initial call can help establish a consistent rhythm and make it easier for both you and the client to remember.

Now that you've decided on the timing, don't forget to actually set the reminder in your calendar! Make sure to block out the time slot and add a note with the client's name, the purpose of the call, and any relevant details you want to discuss during the follow-up.

If you need any more help or have any other questions, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I hope the follow-up call goes smoothly and productively!
